review_blob:
Pours with a small white head and a little bit greenish yellow fluid.
Banana tastes a bit chemical and too present in the beer.

Pours with a larger white head and a golden fluid below.
A very good beer which could act as a benchmark.
Not bad, not outstanding but probably how a beer should be.

Poors with a small white head and a yellow haze.
Tastes fresh and somewhere a bit sweet.

Pours a golden/bronze clear with a white head.
It loses the head quickly but a small head remains.
Carbonate taste and a combination between bitter with a sweet skin around when talking about the taste. The aftertaste is gives a warm feel in the mouth.

Pours a nice yellow haze with a lot of foam.
Feels fresh on the first taste but afterwards turns a bit sour/bitter.

A golden pour and one of the best blond beers.
A good balance from the ingredients. Doesn't taste strong in alcohol but it is.
Fine herbal taste but not too strong.

Less special then the '12.
As a blond it's not bad but I've tasted better ones. But still in my top 3 blond beers.
Still a soft taste for the tongue and pours gold with a white head which doesn't stays that long.
Nice herb taste which stays long in your mouth.

A strong beer with a brown color and a white head. Drank it at the La Trappe brewery in the tasting area. Tastes a bit like wine and has sometimes a sweet flavor but the first moments of touching your tongue could be a bit bitter. The beer tastes as a strong alcoholic beer (feels stronger then Rochefort 10 and WV'12). Tastes rougher then those both. 
A good beer.

One of the better "supermarket" beers/pils available in Holland. Also a bit pricier then a Heineken or Jupiler. Tastes as a heavier Pils not that bitter and has a tint of sweet taste after swallowing. Pours a clear gold beer.
This beer surprised me, comes close to the WV'12. But has a bit more of a rough taste. Compared to the price/quality ratio it's better than WV'12 but on bare quality it misses a tiny bit of finesse.

A very smooth drink. Full of aroma and a touch of sweet. No massive carbon dioxide flavor to the beer. 
Lives up the hype around and probably correct the best beer in the world.
Very different also then other beers I've tasted before. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
